thread.title: Dr. Veryl D. Hodges, D.O., F.A.C.O.I., Is Recognized By Continental Who's Who Among Pinnacle Professionals
thread.title_full: Dr. Veryl D. Hodges, D.O., F.A.C.O.I., Is Recognized By Continental Who's Who Among Pinnacle Professionals

title: Dr. Veryl D. Hodges, D.O., F.A.C.O.I., Is Recognized By Continental Who's Who Among Pinnacle Professionals
text:
Dr. Veryl D. Hodges, D.O., F.A.C.O.I., Is Recognized By Continental Who's Who Among Pinnacle Professionals By PR Newswire | 08/25/15 - 01:48 PM EDT Reprint JONESBORO, Ark. , Aug. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Dr. Veryl D. Hodges , D.O., F.A.C.O.I., is recognized by Continental Who's Who among Pinnacle Professionals in the field of Healthcare as a result of his role as Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine at Clopton Clinic. St. Bernards Clopton Clinic started as an unincorporated private medical practice in 1965 by O.H. Clopton , M.D. Since its inception, the clinic has grown to expand in many additional areas of medicine to increase patient care and patient education services.Recognized by Doctors of Excellence, Dr. Hodges specializes in the following: internal medicine, gastroenterology, hematology, nephrology, oncology, pulmonology and more. With over twenty years of experience, Dr. Hodges is a heavily regarded medical professional who has received many accolades throughout the course of his illustrious career. Dr. Hodges received the distinction of Physician of the Year by the state of Arkansas as well as Outstanding Professional of the Year and Humanitarian of the Year. Board Certified in Internal Medicine, he is a Fellow of the American College of Osteopathic Internists and enjoys reading, travel and spending time with his grandson in his time outside of the clinic. Furthermore, he received his Medical degree from the Kirksdale Osteopathic School of Medicine and went on to complete both his internship and residency at Tulsa Regional Medical Center. For more information, please visit www.stbcloptonclinic.com Contact: Robert Basilin , 516-825-5634, pr@continentalwhoswho.com To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/dr-veryl-d-hodges-do-facoi-is-recognized-by-continental-whos-who-among-pinnacle-professionals-300132917.html SOURCE Continental Who's Who Copyright 2011 PR Newswire.
